title: kandanE undan
sahitya:
kandanE undan kazhalaDi tozhuvEn endan cintai nondiDAdirundiDa


anupallavi

  cendUr vandunnai sEvikkum anbargaL santOSam eidiDa sheidiDum ayyanE


caraNam    sonda nalam nADa undum Aval kUDi enda vidamum en cintai pughundiDAdu
shen tamizh mozhiyin tIn-shuvai mighundiDum shorkkaLaip-punaindu un porppadap-pugazh pADi
